info.title: Alchemy Private Transactions API JSON-RPC Specification
info.description: A specification of the standard JSON-RPC methods for Private Transactions API.

methods.name: alchemy_getTokenAllowance
methods.summary: Returns the token allowance by spender for a given owner.

params.name: tokenAllowanceRequest
params.description: An object specifying the token contract address, the owner address, and the spender address.

result.name: Allowance
result.description: The amount that the spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner.

schema.description: A decimal string representing the allowance.

methods.name: alchemy_getTokenBalances
methods.summary: Returns ERC-20 token balances for a given address.

params.name: addressOrParams
params.description: A maximum of three parameters: 1) A 20-byte wallet address.   2) A token specification (the string "erc20", "DEFAULT_TOKENS" (deprecated), or an array of token contract addresses).   3) (Optional) an object containing pageKey/maxCount for pagination.

pageKey.description: Used for pagination if more results are available.

maxCount.description: Maximum number of token balances to return per call (capped at 100).

result.name: Token Balances
result.description: An object containing the queried address and an array of token balance objects.

address.title: hex encoded address
address.description: Address for which token balances were returned.

tokenBalances.description: Array of token balance objects. Exactly one of tokenBalance or error is non-null.

tokenBalance.description: Hex-encoded string of the token balance, or null if error is present.

error.description: Error message if something went wrong retrieving this token's balance; otherwise null.

methods.name: alchemy_getTokenMetadata
methods.summary: Returns metadata for a given token contract (name, symbol, decimals, logo).

result.name: Token Metadata
result.description: Object with name, symbol, decimals, and an optional logo URL.

name.description: Token's name, or null if not found.

symbol.description: Token's symbol, or null if not found.

decimals.description: Number of decimals the token uses, or null if not found.

logo.description: URL of the token's logo image, or null if none available.
